title: Fix mode selector active underline width clipping

requirements.summary: Ensure the PERSONAL/PROFESSIONAL selector underline/border spans the full bold text width in the active state, matching hover behavior without changing any existing transitions/animations.
acceptanceCriteria: When PERSONAL is active, the border/underline spans the full width of the bold “PERSONAL” text with no clipping or shortfall.
When PROFESSIONAL is active, the border/underline spans the full width of the bold “PROFESSIONAL” text with no clipping or shortfall.
Hover behavior remains visually identical to current behavior (same animation/transition behavior and appearance).
No transition properties (durations/easings/delays) are modified for the mode selector elements.

file_operations.description: Apply the minimal CSS/class adjustments to the `.mode-selector` underline implementation so the underline/border sizing is based on the element’s current rendered text width (including bold glyph width) in the active/selected state, while keeping all existing transition/animation properties unchanged.
